data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: to flee, run away/off, escape, fleeing, flight, act of fleeing/running away. mafarr - refuge, shift, place of refuge.
data.sentence: The word فَرَّتْ comes from the root ف ر ر and is associated with the meanings: to flee, run away/off, escape, fleeing, flight, act of fleeing/running away. mafarr - refuge, shift, place of refuge.

data.meanings: to force any one, compel. qaswarat (pl. qasawiratun) - lion, sturdy, powerful.
data.sentence: The word قَسْوَرَةٍ comes from the root ق س ر and is associated with the meanings: to force any one, compel. qaswarat (pl. qasawiratun) - lion, sturdy, powerful.
